question_text:
Question 50
Consider a one-dimensional steady heat conduction process through a solid slab of
 
thickness 0.1 m. The 
higher temperature side 
A
 has a surface temperature of 
0
80
 C,
 
and the heat transfer rate per unit area to 
low temperature side 
B
 is 4.5 kW/m
2
. The
 
thermal conductivity of the slab is 15 W/m.K. The rate of 
entropy generation per
 
unit area during the heat transfer process is ________ W/m
2
.K (round off to 2
 
decimal places).
